summary: Gut-Punch: A dark-themed secure enclave analytics app with custom domain setup, social media preview cards, Pro subscription tiers, and landing page emphasizing the 'Handshake Protocol' narrative. User wants to publish to Caffeine App Market with paid clones and configure OISY wallet for royalty payments.
architectural_notes: Custom domain configuration available in Admin Dashboard (Pro tier required)
Social media preview cards configured with title, description, and branding
Pro subscription required for backdoor/admin access (Stripe/Gemini key config)
Share functionality copies app URL to clipboard for universal sharing
Landing page narrative focused on 'The Handshake Protocol' with tiered sovereignty model

existing_features.title: Add a 'Publish to Market' section in the Admin Dashboard that allows the admin to configure app market listing settings including price (in USD), app description for the marketplace, and category selection
Create an OISY wallet configuration panel in the Admin Dashboard where the admin can input their OISY wallet principal ID and select their preferred payout currency (USDC, Bitcoin, or ICP)
Display the current app market publishing status in the Admin Dashboard showing whether the app is published, the current price, connected wallet status, and total royalties earned

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish app to Caffeine App Market with paid clone pricing
Configure OISY wallet for royalty payments (USDC/Bitcoin/ICP)
Add a backend endpoint to store and retrieve app market configuration including price, description, category, wallet principal, and payout currency preference
